title: How do I attach files to an email? Is there any restriction on the attachment size?
answer:
When writing an email, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150501081004217001.png) to add an attachment.

The size of a single attachment must not exceed 5 MB. 

 Note: Different email servers support different sized attachments. If the size of an attachment exceeds the size allowed by the receiving email server, the email can't be sent.
